description:
** This is the FREE version.  If you like this and would like to support us, grab Wizards 2 RPG, also on the App Catalog!  Better graphics, more quests, more abilities, more more more! **

In Wizards RPG Free, players can become a Wizard, Rogue, or Warrior. The game features a real turn-based combat system, 41 weapons, 13 types of armor, 15 charms, over 30 quests, over 40 unique monsters, and 12 levels of play. Help needy people in the town solve problems they can never seem to do on their own. Level up by defeating your Class Master, and earn new special abilities to adi you in combat. Spend stat points in your character's Agility, Strength, or Intellect. You will explore 12 zones in 4 areas. Upload your progress to leaderboards and compare your stats against other players from all over the world! Player progress is saved automatically. Users can reload their created characters and continue play where they left off. Please do not leave a negative review for technical issues before contacting us for help.
